briefTitle: Active Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis (JIA) Compassionate Use
officialTitle: Compassionate Use Study of Adalimumab in Children 2 to < 4 Years Old or Age 4 and Above Weighing Less Than 15 kg With Active Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis (JIA)
summary: The main objective of this study is to evaluate the safety of adalimumab in patients 2 to \< 4 years of age or â‰¥ 4 years of age weighing \< 15 kg, with moderately to severely active polyarticular juvenile idiopathic arthritis (JIA) or polyarticular course JIA.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: TEAEs were collected from first dose of study drug until 70 days after the last dose of study drug and before start of commercial adalimumab or other biologics (32.5 months).
